availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eugene Michot (Louisville, Kentucky, jeweler and watchmaker)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, jeweler and watchmaker. Native of Switzerland. Married to Adeline Sorel Michot in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on January 31, 1857. Jeweler in partnership with Louis Edward Michot in Michot & Brothers in Louisville from 1851 to 1857. Watchmaker in Louisville in 1858. Jeweler in Louisville in 1859. Jeweler and watchmaker in Louisville in 1860. Jeweler and watchmaker in Louisville in 1861. Jeweler in Louisville in 1864. Watchmaker in Louisville in 1865.
